mapper.select: SELECT t.theaterIdx, t.theaterRegion, t.theaterName, t.theaterStatus, s.screenName, s.screenSeatCount, s.screenType, s.screenStatus, s.screenIdx FROM theater t JOIN screen s ON t.theaterIdx = s.theaterIdx LIMIT #{begin, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{end, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t.theaterIdx, t.theaterRegion, t.theaterName, t.theaterStatus, s.screenName, s.screenSeatCount, s.screenType, s.screenStatus, s.screenIdx FROM theater t JOIN screen s ON t.theaterIdx = s.theaterIdx WHERE 1=1
AND theaterRegion LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND theaterName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cinema_db.theater t JOIN cinema_db.screen s ON t.theaterIdx = s.theaterIdx WHERE 1=1
AND theaterRegion LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND theaterName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT t.theaterIdx, t.theaterRegion, t.theaterName, t.theaterStatus, s.screenName, s.screenSeatCount, s.screenType, s.screenStatus, s.screenIdx FROM theater t JOIN screen s ON t.theaterIdx = s.theaterIdx WHERE t.theaterIdx = #{theaterIdx} AND s.screenIdx = #{screenIdx}
